attributes.action: Walk a mile in our shoes, MP's to live off minimum wage for 2 months
attributes.additional_details:
I would love to see the MP's walk a mile in the shoes of the WORKING public and live off minimum wage (or even £7 per hr!) for 2 months, while continuing to pay their fuel and council tax bills, insure and drive their cars, pay their mortgage and feed and clothe themselves, while only recieving the same monitary help as many in this country - nothing!

Most voters believe that MPs are out of touch with the working population of Britain, walk a mile in our shoes and see if you can learn anything. See if you are able to understand what we say any better!
